name: Plague of Yamorn
description:
Yamorn, once prosperous and thriving town. Lost to the plague.

As a captain of the Yamorn guard you have to do whatever it takes to save as many innocent lives, even if by eradicating those already claimed by this affliction and spearheading the way out of this godforsaken hellhole.

As a plague doctor, after receiving a mysterious letter, you depart to Yamorn with the sole purpose and duty to cleanse all the infected, uncover the secrets behind this infection and eradicate the root of it.

Explore the ruined town and its surrounding areas, rummage its remains for materials, find and craft new offensive and defensive items.
Purchase the pickings from opportunistic grave robbers.
Exploit the plagues empowering properties to gain powers and stack the odds in your favor.

No one else will.
